summary: Email correspondence between legal personnel discussing a draft application for an amended search warrant to correct FBI barcode numbers for three devices seized from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence. The email includes attachments of the draft application and referenced exhibits.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the person whose New York residence was searched, from which three devices were seized.

events.title: Seizure of devices from Epstein's NY residence
events.description: Three devices were seized from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence during a search.

events.title: Draft application for amended search warrant
events.description: A draft application for an amended search warrant was prepared to correct FBI barcode numbers for the three seized devices.

keyFacts: Three devices were seized from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.
An amended search warrant application was being prepared to correct FBI barcode numbers for those devices.
The email correspondence occurred on October 22, 2020, regarding legal procedural matters.
The document is part of the legal process to ensure proper handling and documentation of evidence.
